fields.infoText:
We recommend that you make all of your Air Passenger Duty payments electronically.

Paying electronically is safe and secure and provides certainty about when your payment will reach us.

Whichever way you choose to pay, you will need to send in your form APD2 Air Passenger Duty Return by the due date. 

Follow the link below for information on how you can pay HMRC
